title: New: Blooms – Skin
body:
**Blooms**, or more specifically their record label (Dusk, Dais, Dawn) know how to play the game.

With little information online available about Blooms, aside from a record label [Bandcamp](http://duskdaisdawn.bandcamp.com/) and [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/duskdaisdawn), alongside a very considered image, Blooms demonstrate an immediate understanding of how hype production works. Their debut track, Skin, is a gorgeous, female vocal led synth-pop number, in the veins of London Grammar or Vaults, yet darker, and slightly more introvert. Check out _Skin_ below.
